樒字的基本解释

樒
mì
古书上说的一种似槐的香木。

樒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mì］
［《廣韻》美畢切，入質，明。］
(1)木名。
(2)为人名用字。明代有朱睦樒。

樒字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樒； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页549第29
【唐韻】美畢切【集韻】莫必切，?音蜜。香木。【本草】引《南越志》：交州有蜜香樹，欲取，先斷其根，經年後，外皮朽爛，木心與節堅黑。沉水者爲沉香。浮水面平者爲雞骨，最麤者爲棧香。

樒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
樒字的起名意思

古书上说的一种似槐的香木。

樒
Basic explanation of words
樒
mì
A fragrant wood that resembles acacia in ancient books.
樒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mì］
["Guangyun" is beautiful, thorough and clear. ]
(1) Wooden name.
(2) Use words for names. There was Zhu Muyu in the Ming Dynasty.
樒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　樒; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 549 29
[Tang Yun] Beautifully cut [Ji Yun] Do not cut,? Yin honey. Fragrant wood. [Materia Medica] Quoting from "Nan Yue Zhi": Jiaozhou has honey fragrant trees. If you want to get them, you must cut off its roots. After years, the skin will decay, and the wooden heart and knots will be black. The sinker is agarwood. The one with flat surface is chicken bone, and the thickest one is stack incense.
